channel.title: Some questions?
channel.description:
Hey, Guys I just a few question about private server and by the way the [b]MOPARSCAPE COMMUNITY[/b] is [b]GREAT[/b]!!!
Ok lets get started ....
1st question - [b]How can I do it so who ever logs on to my server gets a admin crown and the ::pickup command but not ::ban and ::mute?[/b]
2nd question - [b]ABOUT how many people can a server hold with a RAM of 1GB, 2 GB ad a 512 mb without lagg?[/b]

item.title: Some questions?
item.dc:creator: @x_blitz_x x blitz x
item.description:
@x_blitz_x wrote:

[quote=“theunforgive, post:3, topic:266760”]Ok but then how i can make it so the people that play the server can do ::pickup

[quote author=x blitz x link=topic=352255.msg2702115#msg2702115 date=1236703869]
Find,

out.write(playerRights);

Because admin crown is 2, you must change playerRights to 2.

out.write(2);

[size=15pt]Note: This only gives the APPEARANCE of an admin, they are still a normal player, just with a crown :P[/size]

[/quote][/quote]

Look at the command and work it out, it has something to do with the if statement.

Read full topic
